title: Uzbek-Oman
Investment Company
hero.subtitle: Welcome to Uzbek-Oman Investment Company – a trusted partner in fostering economic growth and strengthening business ties between Uzbekistan and Oman.

about.title: We Build the Future Through Innovation and Strategic Investments
about.description: Established in 2009 as a partnership between Uzbekistan Fund for Reconstruction & Development (UFRD) and Oman Investment Authority (OIA). Committed capital: US $500 million, managing over US $250 million in assets. Among the first foreign direct investors in Uzbekistan, adhering to top governance standards.

points.title: Focused industries
points.description: Industries essential to economic growth and attractive returns such as heavy industry, consumer goods, logistics, healthcare, education, tourism and more.

points.title: Investment targets
points.description: Private companies in need of growth capital; projects that fill the gap in the industry value chain

points.title: Value added
points.description: Add value to the investee companies via growth, capital restructuring, efficiency and corporate governance improvements

form.privacy: I agree with the Privacy Policy
